info: A wild wyvern. It can occasionally breathe fire at your opponent, causing blight.
info_zh: 野生的飛龍.有時候能對你的對手噴火,造成枯萎.

info: A tamed crow. It has a small chance of boosting your speed in battle.
info_zh: 被馴服的烏鴉.有小機率提升你的速度.

info: A traveler's best friend.
info_zh: 旅行者的最佳良伴.

info: A tamed red slime. It is not very powerful, but may assist you in battle with fire magic.
info_zh: 被馴服的紅色史萊姆. 雖然不太強, 但能用火炎魔法協助你戰鬥.

info: A living gargoyle. It can assist in battle by rarely petrifying your opponent.
info_zh: 會動的石像鬼.有極低機會石化你的對手.

info: A tamed slime. It is not very powerful, but may assist you in battle.
info_zh: 被馴服的史萊姆. 雖然不太強, 但能協助你戰鬥.

info: An experienced gnome who brings unstable magic into battle.
info_zh: 能夠使用不穩定魔法的老練侏儒.

info: A tamed wolf. It will often attack your enemies in battle.
info_zh: 被馴服的狼. 它在戰鬥中會時常攻擊你的敵人.

info: A tamed snake. Occasionally, it can poison your opponents in battle.
info_zh: 被馴服的蛇. 在戰鬥中有時候能讓你的對手中毒.

info: A tamed bat. It can drain HP from your enemies in battle.
info_zh: 被馴服的蝙蝠，能在戰鬥中吸收對手生命值。

info: A tamed golem. It will cast protection on you in battle.
info_zh: 受馴服的魔像。會在戰鬥中保護你。

info: The storied yeti. Can boost your defenses in battle while assisting you with ice magic.
info_zh: 傳說中的雪怪.能提升你的防禦並用冰雪魔法掩護你.

info: A wild bear. It will frequently attack your enemies.
info_zh: 很狂野的熊。牠會瘋狂啃噬你的敵人。

info: A tamed Drake. It will occasionally summon meteor against your enemies.
info_zh: 被馴服的龍獸.有時候會召喚隕石攻擊你的敵人.

info: A spooky ghost. It may put your opponent to sleep.
info_zh: 陰森的幽靈.有機會讓你的對手入睡.

info: A mimic. What it is capable of is unknown.
info_zh: 就是一隻寶箱怪，而你永遠也猜不到它下一步想幹嘛。

info: A gnome. It can assist you in battle with its spells.
info_zh: 就是個侏儒.能用他的魔法掩護你.

info: A tamed hellhound. Can assist in battle with attacks and fire magic.
info_zh: 被馴服的地獄犬. 能使用攻擊和火炎魔法來協助你戰鬥.

info: A magic fairy. It will heal you in battle.
info_zh: 魔法小妖精.戰鬥中能治療你.

info: A tamed, yet aggressive lizarr warrior. It will attack your enemies in battle.
info_zh: 雖然被馴服但仍具侵略性的蜥蜴人戰士.戰鬥中會攻擊你的敵人.

info: A tamed imp. Will occasionally boost your attack.
info_zh: 被馴服的小惡魔.有時候會提升你的攻擊力.

info: A slime of the darkest variable. It can blind your opponent and use dark magic.
info_zh: 色澤最暗的史萊姆。牠可以使你的對手目盲並且會用黑暗魔法。

info: The reason one would want a banshee with them is still quite unknown.
info_zh: 還是無法理解為何有人想帶著報喪女妖.

info: A strange floating eye. It seems to know rudimentary magic.
info_zh: 一個奇異漂浮的眼睛。它仿佛對魔術粗通皮毛。

info: A fabled finfolk of the sea.
info_zh: 傳說中的海怪.

info: A strange floating ball of energy. It is quite proficient at healing its allies.
info_zh: 一個奇怪的飄浮能量球。它非常善於治愈其盟友。

info: A very mighty bear. It can lend you its might, but at the cost of your defenses.
info_zh: 非常厲害的熊. 能將其蠻力借給你但作為代價將取走你的防禦力。

info: A certainly powerful ally.
info_zh: 一個肯定強大的盟友。

info: A dragon with the power of the earth. It can imbue your weapon with earthen power and cast earthen magic.
info_zh: 擁有大地魔力的龍.能施展土系魔法並賦予你的武器大地屬性.

info: A dragon with the power of the inferno. It can imbue your weapon with fire and cast fire magic.
info_zh: 帶有煉獄魔力的龍.能施展火炎魔法並賦予你的武器火炎屬性.

info: A dragon with the power of the cold. It can imbue your weapon with ice and cast ice magic.
info_zh: 擁有寒冰力量的龍.能施放冰系魔法並賦予你的武器冰屬性.

info: A dragon with the power of the clouds above. It can imbue your weapon with lightning and cast lightning magic.
info_zh: 擁有浮雲魔力的龍.能施展雷系魔法並賦予你的武器雷屬性.

info: A shrouded Sluagh. It utilizes dark magic in battle.
info_zh: 謎樣的勾魂者. 在戰鬥中會使用黑魔法.

info: The storied gazer. It utilizes lightning magic in battle.
info_zh: 傳說中的凝視者.能釋放雷電魔法.

info: The mighty Colossus. It can boost your defenses, while draining an opponent's HP.
info_zh: 崇偉的巨像。能提升你的物防，還能吸收對手生命值。

info: The might cockatrice. It can poison or petrify an opponent, while occasionally boosting your speed in battle.
A great gazer. It can lower an opponents stats, while casting offensive magic.
info_zh: 一個強大的凝視者。牠可以在施放攻擊型法術時，也降低對手屬性。

info: A tamed crow. It has a small chance of boosting your speed in battle.
info_zh: 被馴服的烏鴉.有小機率提升你的速度.

info: The storied Yokai is a master of sleep and that of nightmares.
info_zh: 傳說中的妖怪是操縱睡眠與夢魘的大師。

info: The decrepit Odok. It will frequently assist you in battle.
info_zh: 破舊的亡骸.能夠在戰鬥中幫助你.

info: A tamed basilisk. It is well versed at the art of poison.
info_zh: 被馴服的巴西利斯克.非常擅長用毒.

info: The greatest of the Yeti. It is a true master of defense.
info_zh: 至高無上的雪怪.它是防禦的專家.

info: The unrelenting Orthrus.
info_zh: 不屈不撓的犬怪俄耳托斯。

info: A tamed slime, capable of arcane magic.
info_zh: 馴服的史萊姆,會些奧術魔法.

info: An ebony dragon. It can assist one in battle with dark magic.
info_zh: 漆黑的龍.能用暗黑魔法幫助你戰鬥.

info: A wisp of the night, versed in magic of both light and dark.
info_zh: 通曉光與暗之魔法的夜之幽光.

info: A tamed warg. It will assist in battle with dark strikes.
info_zh: 被馴服的座狼.能使用暗黑的攻擊.

info: An ivory dragon of the light skies. It is extremely versed in holy magic.
info_zh: 散發出象牙白光的龍.牠特別擅長神聖魔法.

info: A magical Jinn. It can cast unstable magic while turning the tide of the battle.
A tricky yokai.  It has a chance of causing an opponent one of many ailments
A stray Reaper of Ankou. It will not attack often, but will wreck havoc when it does.
An elusive Great Dragon. It can assist in battle with powerful dragon spells.
info_zh: 難以捉摸的巨龍。他能在戰鬥中用強大的龍系法術協助你。

info: A great magic fairy. It will cure your status effects in battle
A mighty griffin. It can assist you in battle by improving your dexterity, while casting dragon magic.
A golem forged of Orichalcum. It can assist you in battle with Ward and defensive based skills.
info_zh: 奧利哈鋼組成的魔像.其防禦性的技能與護盾能在戰鬥中幫到你.

info: A mighty griffin. It can assist you in battle by improving your critical hit rate, while casting dragon magic.
The mighty cockatrice. It can poison or petrify an opponent, while occasionally boosting your speed in battle.
info_zh: 強大的雞蛇.能石化或使對手中毒,偶爾還能提升你的敏捷.

info: A Giant Red Basilisk. It will assist in battle by attacking often.
A golem forged of Ortanite. It can assist you in battle with Ward and defensive based skills.
info_zh: 用歐坦尼組成的魔像.其防禦性的技能與護盾能在戰鬥中幫助到你.

info: A fierce Chimera. This follower can cause one to go berserk, while assisting in battle with beastly spells.
info_zh: 兇猛的奇美拉.能使人陷入狂暴,並能施展殘暴的法術.

info: A great undead golem. It will assist you in battle by granting and restoring ward.
info_zh: 強大的不死魔像。它會在戰鬥中協助防禦與恢復護盾。

info: A mighty slime warrior. It will attack your foes often.
info_zh: 強力的史萊姆戰士. 會經常攻擊你的敵人.

info: The great cursed Fafnir. While curing on of status ailments, it will assist you in battle with dark and dragon magic.
The mightiest of mimics. It will cause mischief in battle while casting spells.
info_zh: 非常調皮的寶箱怪，它會在戰鬥中惡作劇。

info: A tamed Cerberus of Balor. It can assist in battle with spells of fire.
info_zh: 被馴服的巴羅爾的地獄三頭犬. 牠能使用火炎魔法來協助你戰鬥.

info: A reckless Gazer. Be careful bringing this one with you.
info_zh: 無畏的凝視者.帶著它要當心.

info: The revered bat of death. It can drain HP from your opponents while improving your stats.
info_zh: 令人敬畏的死亡蝙蝠。它能吸收對手的生命值還能提升你的能力。

info: The magical might of the Jackal god knows no bounds.
info_zh: 胡狼神的魔力是無止境的。

info: A happily singing harpy. It can assist you in battle by improving your dexterity or causing an opponent to be lulled to sleep.
The revered Death Worm of the sands. It can harden your defenses while casting Earthen magic.
info_zh: 沙中的致命蠕蟲.施展大地魔法的同時也能提升你的物理防禦.

info: A horrific serpentine dragon capable of beastly attacks.
info_zh: 能使出兇猛攻擊的恐怖海龍.

info: This dreaded beast of the seas can assist you in battle with status effects and HP absorption.
info_zh: 這傳說中的深海猛獸能吸取生命值並造成對手狀態異常.

info: The unrelenting Fenrir. It can assist you in battle with strong physical attacks and status effects.
info_zh: 不屈的芬里爾.能使用強大的物理攻擊和異常狀態影響來幫助你戰鬥.

info: A spooky gheist. It may put your opponent to sleep.
info_zh: 陰森的鬼魂.有可能使你的對手入睡.

info: A tamed dire wolf. It can assist you in battle with attack and dexterity boosting skills.
info_zh: 被馴服的野狼.能用攻擊和提升敏捷的技能幫助你.

info: A flame of arcane power. It can assist one in battle with both arcane and dragon magic.
info_zh: 擁有奧術魔力的火焰.能施展奧術及龍系魔法來幫助你.

info: A seer of Ra. It can blind an opponent in battle.
info_zh: 拉的眼.能使對手致盲.

info: A live cactus. It can assist you in battle with barrages of needles.
info_zh: 會動的仙人掌.能發射細針彈幕.

info: A grimly singing succubus. It can assist you in battle by improving your dexterity or attack power.
info_zh: 色色地唱著歌的魅魔.能提升你的敏捷和攻擊力.

info: A draugr of certain magical ability.
info_zh: 擁有魔法技能的屍鬼.

info: A magical Jinn. It can cast fey magic while granting its talents to its master.
info_zh: 帶魔力的神燈精靈.能施展變異的魔法並施加他的能力給其主人.

info: A rare Fjalar. It can assist one in battle by increasing dexterity and critical hit rate.
info_zh: 稀有的法亞拉.能提升你的敏捷和爆擊機率.

info: A rare Turul. It can assist one in battle by diminishing an opponent's stats.
A beast of great myth. It can assist you in battle with powerful strikes and curative holy magic
A trusty steed. It can assist one in battle with offensive skills and boost one's dexterity.
A mighty steed. It can assist one in battle with offensive skills and boosts to one's dexterity.
info_zh: 超威猛的駿馬.能使用攻擊性的技能並提升你的敏捷.

info: A lobster. It can cause your opponents to bleed while slightly healing you.
info_zh: 龍蝦. 讓你的對手失血的同時也微幅治療你.

info: A beast of great myth. It can assist you in battle with powerful dark strikes and debuffs.
info_zh: 來自於神秘的野獸.能用暗黑的打擊技能與減益來幫助你.

info: A green lobster. It can cause your opponents to bleed while slightly healing you.
info_zh: 綠色的龍蝦. 讓你的對手失血的同時也微幅治療你.

info: A brown crustacean. It can cause your opponents to bleed while slightly healing you.
info_zh: 棕色的蝦蝦.能讓你的對手流血同時也稍微治療你.

info: A giant live cactus. It can assist you in battle with barrages of needles.
info_zh: 會動的巨型仙人掌.能發射細針彈幕.

info: Available for a limited time: the terrible twin Castor can assist you in battle with great elemental resistance.
info_zh: 期間限定: 凶狠的雙子法師在戰鬥中能使用強力的元素守護來幫助你.

info: Available for a limited time: the terrible twin Pollux can assist you in battle with a variety of skills.
info_zh: 期間限定：凶狠的雙子波魯克斯在戰鬥中能使用諸般技能來幫助你。

info: Available for limited time only, this massive flame can ensure your opponent is always lit ablaze.
Available for limited time only, this massive flame can ensure your opponent is always frozen or lit ablaze.
Available for a limited time only: a companion of Merlin, this great bird can assist one in battle by increasing magical potential.
info_zh: 期間限定:梅林的同行者,這隻能提升魔法攻擊力的鳥會協助你戰鬥.

info: Oh, the foul fairy Naggeneen. Available for limited time.
A true brute of stories of old. Available for a limited time only.
info_zh: 真實存在的古老殘酷童話.期間限定.

info: A beastly chimera lost to the curse of Morrigan. Available for a limited time only.
info_zh: 臣服於摩莉甘詛咒的野蠻奇美拉.期間限定.

info: A gazer lost to the curse of Morrigan. Available for a limited time only.
info_zh: 臣服於摩莉甘詛咒的凝視者.期間限定.

info: A dragon lost to the curse of Morrigan. Available for a limited time only.
info_zh: 臣服於摩莉甘詛咒的巨龍.期間限定.

info: A great yeti lost to the curse of Morrigan. Available for a limited time only.
info_zh: 臣服於摩莉甘詛咒的強大雪怪.期間限定.

info: An apparition of greed and envy. Available for a limited time only.
info_zh: 貪婪與忌妒的代名詞.期間限定.

info: An apparition of greed and envy. Available for a limited time only.
info_zh: 貪婪與忌妒的代名詞.期間限定.

info: The mighty Phoenix, arisen once again. Available for a limited time only.
info_zh: 崇偉的鳳凰再次降臨人間.期間限定.

info: The mighty Phoenix, fallen once again. Available for a limited time only.
info_zh: 崇偉的鳳凰再次降臨人間.期間限定.

info: Arisen from the deep depths of the Underworld. Available for a limited time only.
Oh, the foul fairy Naggeneen. Available for limited time.
A most plagued cactus. It can assist you in battle with barrages of needles.
info_zh: 很擾人的仙人掌，能用細針彈幕幫助你戰鬥。

info: The untamed beast. Available for a limited time only.
info_zh: 桀驁不馴的野獸.期間限定.

info: The untamed beast. Available for a limited time only.
info_zh: 桀驁不馴的野獸.期間限定.

info: The untamed beast. Available for a limited time only.
info_zh: 桀驁不馴的野獸.期間限定.

info: The Questing Beast. Available for a limited time only.
info_zh: 吠獸，期間限定。

info: A beast of Avalonian pride. Available for a limited time only.
info_zh: 阿瓦隆自豪的野獸，期間限定。

info: The divine horse of Avalon. Available for a limited time only.
info_zh: 阿瓦隆的神駒，期間限定。

info: A frightful black wolf. Available for a limited time only.
info_zh: 可怕的黑狼，期間限定。

info: The foul witch herself. Available for a limited time only.
info_zh: 骯髒的女巫，期間限定。

info: The mighty stallion of Arthus. Available for a limited time only.
info_zh: 亞瑟的強大種馬，期間限定。

info: Hel's follower, this hawk will give one great speed. Available for a limited time only.
info_zh: 期間限定:赫爾的跟隨者，這隻老鷹提供極快的速度。

info: A mythical serpent capable of carrying out the majesty's desired executions. Available for a limited time only.
info_zh: 期間限定:能夠為陛下執行處決的神話蛇。

info: An extra spooky ghost. It may put your opponent to sleep. Available for a limited time only.
info_zh: 令人毛骨悚然的幽靈。有機會讓你的對手入睡。限時特賣。

info: A scary skeleton. It can act often in battle to assist you. Available for a limited time only.
info_zh: 駭人的骷髏。在戰鬥時會頻繁的行動來幫助你。限時特賣。

info: A scary skeleton. It can act often in battle to assist you. Available for a limited time only.
info_zh: 駭人的骷髏。在戰鬥時會頻繁的行動來幫助你。限時特賣。

info: Available for a limited time only.
info_zh: 期間限定。

info: Available for a limited time only.
info_zh: 期間限定。

info: The reason one would want a banshee with them is still quite unknown. Available for a limited time only.
info_zh: 人們帶著報喪女妖的理由依舊成謎。限時特賣。

info: A small follower of Scruug. Available for a limited time only.
info_zh: 守財奴史古基的小寵物。限時特賣。

info: A small follower of Scruug. Available for a limited time only.
info_zh: 守財奴史古基的小寵物。限時特賣。

info: Arisen from the deep depths of the Underworld. Available for a limited time only.
Available for a limited time only.
info_zh: 期間限定。

info: A Steward in the form of a Cactus.
A Steward in the form of a dragon.
A Steward in the form of a Gazer.
A Steward in the form of a golem.
A Steward in the form of a wolf.
